name: Department Isue Details test
query:
SELECT 
    
    t2.item_name as 'Item Name:Data:250',
    t2.qty as 'Qty',
    t1.department,
    t2.modified as 'Date:Data:200'
FROM 
    `tabAssign Department` t1
JOIN 
    `tabStock Entry Detail` t2 ON t1.account = t2.expense_account
WHERE 
    t2.item_group = 'Consumable'
    and t2.docstatus=1
    AND DATE(t2.modified) BETWEEN %(from)s AND %(to)s
ORDER BY 
     t1.department asc;
